alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Queens, Bronx, Kings, New York (Manhattan) and northwestern Nassau Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 400 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Crown Heights, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jamaica, Flatbush, Flushing, Coney Island, Garden City, Mineola, Westbury, Great Neck, Crown Heights, Throgs Neck Bridge, Kennedy Airport, Laguardia Airport, Jackson Heights, Forest Hills and Canarsie. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern New York. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH

area.areaDesc: Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
